articles.description: VOLKSWAGEN looks set to enter F1 by 2026 with premium brands Porsche and Audi expected to line up on the grid.

articles.author: James Robson
articles.title: Chelsea striker Romelu Lukaku to reject AC Milan and Newcastle interest but Thomas Tuchel frustration growing - Evening Standard
articles.description: Romelu Lukaku will reject any interest from  AC Milan this summer, placing fresh uncertainty over his future.
articles.content:
Romelu Lukaku will reject any interest from AC Milan this summer, placing fresh uncertainty over his future.
The Chelsea striker also has no interest in Newcastle, one of the few teams seen as being… [+3121 chars]
